// Category data
export const categoryCompanies = {
  "Bulge Bracket Investment Banks (BBs)" : [
      "JP Morgan",
      "Goldman Sachs",
      "Morgan Stanley",
      "Bank of America",
      "Citi",
      "Barclays",
      "UBS",

    "In-Between-a-Banks (IBABs)" :[

      "HSBC",
      "BNP Paribas",
      "Mizuho",
      "Nomura",
      "BMO",

      "Lazard",
      "Moelis",
      "Perella Weinberg",
